showFoodIncrement.name: Expected nutrition gain
showFoodIncrement.description: A visual indication of the expected increase in nutrition from the food you currently have in hand.

showEstimatedHealthIncrement.name: Estimated healing
showEstimatedHealthIncrement.description:
Visually indicates the expected healing achieved by eating the food you have in your hand.
Please note that this value is only an estimate and may differ significantly!
The ‘1.7 Hearts’ feature is deactivated in 1.17.2 - 1.20.1 if this feature is active.

showSaturationIncrement.name: Expected saturation gain
showSaturationIncrement.description: Visualizes the expected saturation gain from eating the food you are holding.

showCurrentSaturation.name: Current saturation
showCurrentSaturation.description: Adds a golden border to the Minecraft food HUD to show how full you currently are.

maxOpacity.name: Maximum opacity
maxOpacity.description: Sets the maximum opacity of the visualizations.

speed.name: Period duration
speed.description: Sets the period duration of the flashing in milliseconds.
